document_data.name: Azuth
document_data.mainbody: '''Azuth''' was the  [[divine realm]] of [[Azuth]], the god of [[Wizard]]s.
document_data.Great Wheel Cosmology: In the [[Great Wheel cosmology]], Azuth lay on the layer of [[Buxenus]] in the [[plane]] of [[Arcadia]]. It was an expansive cavern that could only be accessed by entering through the side of a hill in Buxenus. This was protected by a glamor only those with a wizardly bent could see through, although they could guide others through it as well. This entrance led to a winding staircase which led further down until the whole cavern became visible.
document_data.Inhabitants: Apart from Azuth, [[Mystra|Mystra's]] failsafe ‘echoes’ resided here as well, within a royal castle and surrounded by blue mists.{{Cite archive/Greenwood's Grotto/2023-02-15/Location of Mystra's domain}}
